EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-08-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-New-York.ES-2018-02-22 Marketing Invitati
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited - Turbonomic Customer Appreciation Dinner NYC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-newyork/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
At Turbonomic, our customers are the very core of our organization. They drive the evolution of our platform, shape our company culture, and inspire us to continue to bring best-in-class technology to solve the evolving challenges of the modern data center. As a special thank you to our valued customers, we hope you will join us for an evening at Michelin Star restaurant, Ai Fiori, to discuss the exciting new frontier of hybrid cloud as we share what’s new in the latest release of the Turbonomic platform.
New York City Turbonomic Customer Appreciation Dinner <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-newyork/]]> Thursday, March 8th | Ai Fiori NYC | 5:30 p.m. <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-newyork/]]>
Save your seat by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/vip-newyork <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-newyork/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
